root.name: Majesty 2: Monster Kingdom
root.description: PC System RequirementsMinimum:OS: Windows XP/VistaProcessor: 2.0GHz dual core processorMemory: 1 GB RAMGraphics: GeForce 6800 GTX 512MB or better, Pixel Shader 2.0DirectX®: 9.0Hard Drive: 4 GB freeSound: DirectX-compatibleAdditional:Internet connection or LAN required for multiplayerRecommended:OS: Windows XP/VistaProcessor: 3.0GHz dual core processorMemory: 2 GB RAMGraphics: GeForce GTX 280 1GB or better, Pixel Shader 2.0DirectX®: 9.0Hard Drive: 4 GB freeSound: DirectX-compatibleAdditional:Internet connection or LAN required for multiplayer
